code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={isLoggedIn:false,userOb:null,alertMsg:''};export var authSlice=createSlice({name:'auth',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setLoggedIn:function setLoggedIn(state,action){state.isLoggedIn=action.payload;},setUserOb:function setUserOb(state,action){state.userOb=action.payload;},setInterests:function setInterests(state,action){state.userOb.interests=action.payload.split(',').map(function(interest){return interest.trim();});},setAlertMsg:function setAlertMsg(state,action){state.alertMsg=action.payload;},logout:function logout(state){return initialState;}}});var _authSlice$actions=authSlice.actions,setLoggedIn=_authSlice$actions.setLoggedIn,setUserOb=_authSlice$actions.setUserOb,setInterests=_authSlice$actions.setInterests,setAlertMsg=_authSlice$actions.setAlertMsg,logout=_authSlice$actions.logout;export{setLoggedIn,setUserOb,setInterests,setAlertMsg,logout};export default authSlice.reducer;
